changelog: Updated logic for AP World v1.5.1 logic changes:
- All the upper Pink Paw Station locations now have Moderate logic for no Dweller Mask or Hookshot
- Rumbi Abuse no longer requires 4 Time Pieces
Entrances map is now ready for general use
Relics and Contracts have been added to the tracker
Tracker logic should now be up-to-date with the v1.5.1 AP World
Badge Pins have replaced No Bonk Badge in the tracker
Exclude Tour and Tasksanity are now shown in the Settings
Settings have moved to the Settings Popup between the Broadcast View and AP buttons
Fixed automatic map switching not working for Nyakuza Metro
Many Nyakuza Metro logic fixes as well as a few logic fixes for other chapters
Fixed She Came from Outer Space and Your contract has Expired checking for access to the wrong acts.
Added the Arctic Cruise map
The ExcludeTour, Tasksanity, EnableDLC1 and EnableDLC2 options are now read when connecting to AP
Logic fixes to Time Rifts
Logic fixes to Free Roam act completion
Logic fixes to Spaceship, Mafia Town, Battle of the Birds, Subcon Forest and Alpine Skyline
Determining if acts have been completed now uses the ahit_clearedacts_<player number> list, which should be more reliable.
Entrance locations are now cleared when the act at that entrance is completed, or, for free roam acts, when all the acts within the free roam are completed.
Connecting to a slot that has already received many items should be much faster.
All images have been recompressed, reducing the pack size by about 6MB.
General fixes:
- Fixed the Gallery and Lab entrances being around the wrong way on the map.
- Fixed act completion not updating logic in some cases.
Logic fixes:
- Fixed Picture Perfect-specific locations being accessible from The Big Parade.
- Fixed Chapter 2 Blue Time rifts checking for access to the wrong acts.
- Fixed Chapter 2 and 3 boss entrances checking if the prerequisite acts can be completed instead of if the acts have been completed.
- Fixed Windmill Zipline checking for the wrong zipline unlock when accessed from The Illness has Spread.
Act Randomization support has been rewritten.
There is a new work-in-progress Entrances map.
Item sizes have been decreased slightly
Added Nyakuza Metro map icon
Added autotracking for metro tickets
Tour Rift + Pages added to the Spaceship map
Many fixes to Subcon logic and other logic fixes
